dct_title_s: Planisphere de Turquet, planisphere de Bertius, planisphere d'Arzael
dct_description_sm: California shown as an unlabeled island with a flat northern coast. Visible on all 3 maps.

Top map of world with north pole at center of hemisphere. Middle map of 2 joined hemispheres; left of south pole, right of north pole. Bottom map of 2 joined hemispheres; left of America, right of Eastern Hemisphere.
At page top, above map: DU GLOBE TERRESTRE. [page]195[,]FIGURE LXIX. [Figure]195 (map top right). N ij (map bottom right below border).
